My German lesson on @duolingo was so hard today, I actually went down in fluency percentage ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ #BellLetsTalk #keepclimbing
So many people suffer in silence. Let us continue to talk and listen tomorrow. And the next day. And the next. #BellLetsTalk @DaltonPompey
#BellLetsTalk and @DaltonPompey -can't go wrong with that!
Some ppl say "it's all in your head" & mean it's imagined: NO! EVERYTHING starts in your head! Treat your brain with empathy! #BellLetsTalk
That's why we gotta talk! Some ppl think "it's all in your head" means it's imagined: no! EVERYTHING starts in yourâ€¦ https://t.co/7d8FzDvoyr
@anitaelizar @FMNsocial It's amazing how many symptoms #mentalillness can have. Mental health IS physical health!! @Bell_LetsTalk
96,197,559. Think we're gonna beat last year no problem. But KEEP TWEETING #BellLetsTalk
For that matter, I am a judgment-free zone. If ever you need an ear. #BellLetsTalk
MANY people around you right now are suffering silently due to #mentalillness #stigma. Be clear you're a judgment free zone #BellLetsTalk
I can also feel when it's coming on again. I disassociate. I care less in arguments. I want to run away. I don't know "why". #BellLetsTalk
My depression is fickle. It will plague me for so long and then one day be gone. That does NOT mean it wasn't real. #BellLetsTalk
My depression has made me feel so low before. On the plus side, I really realize how far I've come when I reach a high. #BellLetsTalk
Sometimes to get away from my depression I try not to think. But my mind normally races, so this is abnormal for me! #BellLetsTalk
Just like every other depression, my depression lies. I AM worthwhile. I AM capable of having a good life. I am NOT a failure #BellLetsTalk
My depression makes me creative, so I try to embrace that side of it when it surfaces. It can also make me numb. #BellLetsTalk
Now for #depression. My depression comes in waves of weeks or sometimes months. Again, the experience depends on each person. #BellLetsTalk
Not everyone's experience with #anxiety and #panicattack will be the same. Talk to your friends. Find out if anyone suffers. #BellLetsTalk
I actually had to ask my dentist what mouth position is "relaxed" because I didn't know - I have had anxiety so long. #TMJ #BellLetsTalk
My anxiety causes me to clench my jaw. I have had TMJ for many years - another physical manifestation of anxiety. #BellLetsTalk
My anxiety also causes me to have chest pains, related to the reflux. Chest tightness, stabbing pains, referred pain. #BellLetsTalk
For me, my anxiety causes heartburn. I've had GERD for >10 years now (I'm 33). Anxiety caused this physical manifestation. #BellLetsTalk
Anxiety for me is the constant state of stress my body gets into sometimes. I don't realize right away, but I know my symptoms #BellLetsTalk
This is why it's important to talk to people in your life who get anxiety/panic attacks, to find out what helps them most. #BellLetsTalk
For this reason, in a panic attack, the last thing I'd want someone to tell me is to "Breathe" #BellLetsTalk
In a panic attack, I notice my breathing & worry that my body will stop breathing if I don't force it - so breathing is hard. #BellLetsTalk
Panic attacks make me feel cold, light-headed. I'm thinking about everything superficially bc my mind races. #BellLetsTalk
Panic attacks cause me to feel like if I was dying, no one would notice in time to save me. #BellLetsTalk
Panic attacks sometimes make me think heart attack - because unexpectedly your heart races and head feels light #BellLetsTalk
Anxiety can show up in unexpected ways. #BellLetsTalk about some of the ways I've encountered it.
Having a #mentalillness is not abnormal & no one picks when they get one. Sometimes it seems physical - that's because it is! #BellLetsTalk
Enjoying these #freedomtweets from the @AltNatParkSer #BellLetsTalk https://t.co/g5rGk8qore
Thanks to @TheBloggess for the follow. Been a fan for years :) #BellLetsTalk connecting people in unexpected ways haha

I need a scientist to explain why bread with jam on it goes prickly after a while. (If you don't believe me, try it)

All PJs should be made with extra long pants cuz there are few things as annoying as pulling one leg down w/one foot then THAT leg is up..
2. Why are women's PJ bottoms so darn short?! I'm petite and they come 1/2 way up my calves - in bed, cuz you know, that's what happens
1. When there's an entire industry devoted to lingerie, why do women's cosy PJ tops have low necks? #socold
2 things occurred to me while folding laundry

@PeelPoliceMedia haha I'd be lying if I said I wasn't worried for him! Impressed one person can handle that whole intersection. Kudos!
@PeelPoliceMedia Felt like he might need physio after all that exercise!! Very busy intersection but he kept us moving haha
@PeelPoliceMedia Today with lights working, I sat through 2 green lights bc left turners blocked intersection. Wished he was there again! ðŸ˜Š
@PeelPoliceMedia Hey I just wanted to commend your officer who was directing traffic yesterday at Matheson/Dixie. Very active, very direct
